info.title: OpenAlex API
info.description: The OpenAlex API provides access to a comprehensive catalog of scholarly works, authors, sources, institutions, topics, keywords, publishers, and funders. OpenAlex indexes over 250 million scholarly works.

tags.name: Works
tags.description: Scholarly documents like journal articles, books, datasets, and theses

tags.name: Authors
tags.description: People who create scholarly works

tags.name: Sources
tags.description: Journals, repositories, and other venues where works are hosted

tags.name: Institutions
tags.description: Universities, research organizations, and other affiliations

tags.name: Topics
tags.description: Research topics automatically assigned to works

tags.name: Keywords
tags.description: Short phrases identified from works' topics

tags.name: Publishers
tags.description: Companies and organizations that publish scholarly works

tags.name: Funders
tags.description: Organizations that fund research

tags.name: Autocomplete
tags.description: Fast typeahead search for any entity type

tags.name: Domains
tags.description: Top-level categories in the topic hierarchy (4 total)

tags.name: Fields
tags.description: Second-level categories in the topic hierarchy (26 total)

tags.name: Subfields
tags.description: Third-level categories in the topic hierarchy (254 total)

tags.name: SDGs
tags.description: UN Sustainable Development Goals (17 total)

tags.name: Countries
tags.description: Geographic countries for filtering research by location

tags.name: Continents
tags.description: Geographic continents (7 total)

tags.name: Languages
tags.description: Languages of scholarly works

tags.name: Awards
tags.description: Research grants and funding awards

tags.name: Concepts
tags.description: Legacy taxonomy of research areas (deprecated - use Topics instead)

tags.name: Work Types
tags.description: Types of scholarly works (article, book, dataset, etc.)

tags.name: Source Types
tags.description: Types of sources (journal, repository, conference, etc.)

tags.name: Institution Types
tags.description: Types of institutions (education, healthcare, company, etc.)

tags.name: Licenses
tags.description: Open access licenses (CC BY, CC BY-SA, etc.)

get.description: Get a list of scholarly works with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination. Works include journal articles, books, datasets, theses, and more.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `cited_by_count`, `publication_date`, `relevance_score` (with search). Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Work fields](/api-reference/works#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single work by its OpenAlex ID or external ID (DOI, PMID, PMCID, MAG ID). External IDs can be passed as full URLs or URN format (e.g., `doi:10.1234/example` or `pmid:12345678`).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: OpenAlex ID (e.g., W2741809807) or external ID (DOI, PMID, PMCID, MAG)

get.description: Get a list of authors with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`, `summary_stats.i10_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Author fields](/api-reference/authors#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single author by OpenAlex ID or ORCID.
Get a list of sources (journals, repositories, conferences) with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Source fields](/api-reference/sources#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single source by OpenAlex ID or ISSN.
Get a list of institutions with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Institution fields](/api-reference/institutions#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single institution by OpenAlex ID or ROR.
Get a list of topics with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination. Topics are research areas automatically assigned to works.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Topic fields](/api-reference/topics#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single topic by OpenAlex ID.
Get a list of keywords with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Keyword fields](/api-reference/keywords#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Keyword fields](/api-reference/keywords#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single keyword by OpenAlex ID.
Get a list of publishers with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `summary_stats.h_index`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Publisher fields](/api-reference/publishers#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single publisher by OpenAlex ID.
Get a list of funders with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `awards_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Funder fields](/api-reference/funders#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single funder by OpenAlex ID or Crossref Funder ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: OpenAlex ID (e.g., F4320306076) or Crossref Funder ID

get.description: Fast typeahead search returning up to 10 results. Use for search-as-you-type interfaces.

**DEPRECATED:** This endpoint is deprecated and not recommended for new projects. It will not receive updates or support.

Classify arbitrary text to find relevant OpenAlex topics. Costs $0.01 per request.
Check your current rate limit status including usage and remaining allowance.

List all available changefile dates. Each date has downloadable files containing every entity record that was created or modified on that day. For a full guide on using changefiles to keep your local data current, see [Download Changefiles](/download/changefiles).

url.description: URL to get details and download links for this date

get.description: Get details for a specific date's changefile, including which entity types changed, how many records, and download links in JSONL and Parquet formats. For a full guide on using changefiles to keep your local data current, see [Download Changefiles](/download/changefiles).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The changefile date in YYYY-MM-DD format

count.description: Number of entity types with changes

entity.description: The entity type (e.g., works, authors, institutions)

records.description: Number of created or modified records

url.description: Download URL for gzipped JSONL file

get.description: Get a list of domains (top-level topic categories). There are only 4 domains: Life Sciences, Social Sciences, Physical Sciences, and Health Sciences.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Domain fields](/api-reference/domains#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Domain fields](/api-reference/domains#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single domain by its ID (1-4).
Get a list of fields (second-level topic categories). There are 26 fields spread across 4 domains.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Field fields](/api-reference/fields#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single field by its ID.
Get a list of subfields (third-level topic categories). There are 254 subfields spread across 26 fields.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Subfield fields](/api-reference/subfields#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single subfield by its ID.
Get a list of UN Sustainable Development Goals. There are 17 SDGs.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter SDGs. Examples: `id:3` (Good Health), `works_count:>100000` See [all SDG fields](/api-reference/sdgs#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all SDG fields](/api-reference/sdgs#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all SDG fields](/api-reference/sdgs#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single Sustainable Development Goal by its ID (1-17).
Get a list of countries. Useful for filtering works by author affiliation country.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Country fields](/api-reference/countries#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Country fields](/api-reference/countries#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single country by its ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, GB, CN)

get.description: Get a list of continents (7 total).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Continent fields](/api-reference/continents#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Continent fields](/api-reference/continents#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single continent by its Wikidata Q-ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Wikidata Q-ID (e.g., Q49 for North America)

get.description: Get a list of languages used in scholarly works.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Language fields](/api-reference/languages#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type. See [all Language fields](/api-reference/languages#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single language by its ISO 639-1 code.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., en, zh, es)

get.description: Get a list of research grants and funding awards.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `funded_outputs_count`, `amount`, `start_year`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Award fields](/api-reference/awards#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: Retrieve a single award by its OpenAlex ID.
**DEPRECATED:** Use Topics instead. Get a list of concepts from the legacy taxonomy.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`, `level`. Prefix with `-` for descending. See [all Concept fields](/api-reference/concepts#available-filter-sort-and-group_by-fields).

get.description: **DEPRECATED:** Use Topics instead. Retrieve a single concept by OpenAlex ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: OpenAlex ID (e.g., C41008148 for Computer Science)

get.description: Get a list of work types (article, book, dataset, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

get.description: Get a list of source types (journal, repository, conference, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

get.description: Get a list of institution types (education, healthcare, company, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

get.description: Get a list of open access licenses (CC BY, CC BY-SA, etc.).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: `works_count`, `cited_by_count`. Prefix with `-` for descending.

apiKey.name: api_key
apiKey.description: Your OpenAlex API key. Get a free key at https://openalex.org/settings/api

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Filter results using field:value syntax. Multiple filters can be combined with commas (AND) or pipes (OR). Available fields vary by entity type.

search.name: search
search.description: Full-text search across titles, abstracts, and other text fields. Example: `search=machine learning`

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sort results by a field. Prefix with `-` for descending order. Available fields vary by entity type.

per_page.name: per_page
per_page.description: Number of results per page (1-100, default 25)

page.name: page
page.description: Page number for pagination. Use cursor for deep pagination beyond 10,000 results.

cursor.name: cursor
cursor.description: Cursor for deep pagination. Use `cursor=*` to start, then use the `next_cursor` from the response.

sample.name: sample
sample.description: Return a random sample of N results (max 10,000). Cannot be used with sort or page.

select.name: select
select.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return. Reduces response size. Example: `select=id,display_name,cited_by_count`

group_by.name: group_by
group_by.description: Group results by a field and return counts. Available fields vary by entity type.

api_key.name: api_key
api_key.description: Your OpenAlex API key (required). Get a free key at https://openalex.org/settings/api

count.description: Total number of results matching the query

next_cursor.description: Cursor for the next page (when using cursor pagination)

groups_count.description: Number of groups when using group_by

cost_usd.description: Cost of this request in USD

count.description: Number of results in this group

Work.description: A scholarly document (article, book, dataset, thesis, etc.)

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this work.

doi.description: The DOI for the work. This is the Canonical External ID for works.

display_name.description: Same as `title`. Included for consistency with other entities.

publication_year.description: The year this work was published.

publication_date.description: The day when this work was published (ISO 8601 format).

type.description: The type of the work. Common values: `article`, `book`, `dataset`, `preprint`, `dissertation`, `book-chapter`.

cited_by_count.description: The number of citations to this work.

is_retracted.description: True if this work has been retracted (from Retraction Watch database).

is_paratext.description: True if this work is paratext (e.g., front cover, table of contents).

primary_location.description: A Location object with the primary location of this work (closest to the version of record). Includes `source`, `landing_page_url`, `pdf_url`, `is_oa`, `license`, and `version`.

locations.description: List of Location objects describing all unique places where this work lives.

best_oa_location.description: A Location object with the best available open access location for this work.

open_access.description: Information about the access status of this work:

authorships.description: List of Authorship objects representing authors and their institutions. Limited to the first 100 authors. Each authorship includes `author`, `institutions`, `author_position`, `is_corresponding`, and other fields.

abstract_inverted_index.description: The abstract as an inverted index (word positions). OpenAlex doesn't include plaintext abstracts due to legal constraints.

referenced_works.description: OpenAlex IDs for works that this work cites.

referenced_works_count.description: The number of works that this work cites.

related_works.description: OpenAlex IDs for works related to this work (computed algorithmically).

topics.description: List of up to 3 Topics for this work, each with a relevance score.

primary_topic.description: The top ranked Topic for this work, with `id`, `display_name`, `score`, and hierarchy (`subfield`, `field`, `domain`).

keywords.description: Keywords identified based on the work's topics, with relevance scores.

funders.description: Dehydrated Funder objects representing the funders of this work.

awards.description: Dehydrated Award objects representing grants associated with this work.

fwci.description: Field-weighted Citation Impact, calculated as citations received / citations expected.

citation_normalized_percentile.description: Percentile of citation count normalized by work type, year, and subfield. Includes `value`, `is_in_top_1_percent`, `is_in_top_10_percent`.

cited_by_percentile_year.description: Percentile rank compared to other works published in the same year. Contains `min` and `max`.

counts_by_year.description: `cited_by_count` for each of the last ten years.

sustainable_development_goals.description: UN Sustainable Development Goals relevant to this work, with prediction scores.

mesh.description: MeSH tags for works found in PubMed.

indexed_in.description: Sources this work is indexed in. Values: `arxiv`, `crossref`, `doaj`, `pubmed`.

content_url.description: URL for downloading full-text content. Only present when `has_content.pdf` or `has_content.grobid_xml` is true.

created_date.description: When this work was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this work was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

is_oa.description: Whether this location provides open access

version.description: Version of the work at this location

is_oa.description: Whether this work is open access

any_repository_has_fulltext.description: Whether any repository has the full text

Authorship.description: Author and their affiliation for a work

is_corresponding.description: Whether this is the corresponding author

raw_author_name.description: Author name as it appears in the work

Author.description: A person who creates scholarly works

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this author.

orcid.description: The ORCID ID for this author. This is the Canonical External ID for authors.

display_name.description: The name of the author as a single string.

display_name_alternatives.description: Other ways this author's name has been displayed.

works_count.description: The number of works this author has created.

cited_by_count.description: The total number of works that cite a work this author has created.

affiliations.description: List of affiliations this author has claimed in their publications. Each object has:

last_known_institutions.description: This author's last known institutional affiliations. Each item is a dehydrated Institution object.

counts_by_year.description: `works_count` and `cited_by_count` for each of the last ten years.

works_api_url.description: A URL that will get you a list of all this author's works.

created_date.description: When this author was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this author was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Source.description: A journal, repository, or other venue for scholarly works

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this source.

issn_l.description: The ISSN-L (linking ISSN) for this source. This is the Canonical External ID for sources.

issn.description: All ISSNs used by this source. Many publications have multiple ISSNs.

type.description: The type of source: `journal`, `repository`, `conference`, `ebook platform`, `book series`, `metadata`, or `other`.

host_organization.description: The host organization as an OpenAlex ID. This will be an Institution ID if the source is a repository, or a Publisher ID if it's a journal/conference.

host_organization_name.description: The display_name of the host organization.

host_organization_lineage.description: OpenAlex IDs of parent publishers (only for publisher-hosted sources).

is_oa.description: Whether this is currently a fully open-access source.

is_in_doaj.description: Whether this journal is listed in the Directory of Open Access Journals.

works_count.description: The number of works this source hosts.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works hosted in this source.

apc_usd.description: The source's article processing charge in USD.

homepage_url.description: The homepage URL for this source.

counts_by_year.description: `works_count` and `cited_by_count` for each of the last ten years.

works_api_url.description: A URL that will get you a list of all this source's works.

created_date.description: When this source was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this source was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Institution.description: A university, research organization, or other affiliation

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this institution.

ror.description: The ROR ID for this institution. This is the Canonical External ID for institutions.

display_name.description: The primary name of the institution.

country_code.description: ISO two-letter country code where this institution is located.

homepage_url.description: URL for the institution's primary homepage.

image_url.description: URL for an image representing this institution (usually from Wikimedia).

display_name_acronyms.description: Acronyms or initialisms for this institution.

display_name_alternatives.description: Other names people may use for this institution.

works_count.description: The number of works created by authors affiliated with this institution.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works from authors affiliated with this institution.

lineage.description: OpenAlex IDs including this institution and any parent institutions.

counts_by_year.description: `works_count` and `cited_by_count` for each of the last ten years.

works_api_url.description: A URL that will get you a list of all works affiliated with this institution.

created_date.description: When this institution was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this institution was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Topic.description: A research topic automatically assigned to works

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this topic.

display_name.description: The English-language label of the topic.

description.description: A description of this topic, generated by AI.

keywords.description: Keywords representing the content of papers in the topic.

subfield.description: The subfield (third level) containing this topic:

field.description: The field (second level) containing this topic:

domain.description: The domain (highest level) containing this topic:

works_count.description: The number of works tagged with this topic.

updated_date.description: When this topic was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Keyword.description: A keyword identified from works' topics

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this keyword.

display_name.description: The English-language label of the keyword.

works_count.description: The number of works tagged with this keyword.

cited_by_count.description: The total citations to works tagged with this keyword.

created_date.description: When this keyword was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this keyword was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Publisher.description: An organization that publishes scholarly works

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this publisher.

display_name.description: The primary name of the publisher.

alternate_titles.description: Alternate titles for this publisher (including translations).

country_codes.description: ISO two-letter country codes where the publisher is primarily located.

hierarchy_level.description: The hierarchy level for this publisher. Level 0 has no parent publishers.

parent_publisher.description: OpenAlex ID of the direct parent publisher. Null if `hierarchy_level` is 0.

lineage.description: OpenAlex IDs including this publisher and any parent publishers.

works_count.description: The number of works published by this publisher.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works linked to this publisher.

sources_api_url.description: A URL that will get you a list of all sources published by this publisher.

counts_by_year.description: `works_count` and `cited_by_count` for each of the last ten years.

created_date.description: When this publisher was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this publisher was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this funder.

display_name.description: The primary name of the funder.

alternate_titles.description: A list of alternate titles for this funder.

country_code.description: ISO two-letter country code where this funder is located.

homepage_url.description: URL for this funder's primary homepage.

image_url.description: URL for an image representing this funder (usually from Wikimedia).

grants_count.description: The number of grants linked to this funder.

works_count.description: The number of works linked to this funder.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works linked to this funder.

counts_by_year.description: `works_count` and `cited_by_count` for each of the last ten years.

created_date.description: When this funder was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this funder was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Domain.description: Top-level category in the topic hierarchy (4 total)

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this domain.

display_name.description: The English-language label of the domain.

fields.description: The fields within this domain. Each object has `id` and `display_name`.

siblings.description: Other domains at the same level. Each object has `id` and `display_name`.

works_count.description: The number of works tagged with topics in this domain.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works in this domain.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works tagged with this domain.

created_date.description: When this domain was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this domain was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Field.description: Second-level category in the topic hierarchy (26 total)

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this field.

display_name.description: The English-language label of the field.

subfields.description: The subfields within this field. Each object has `id` and `display_name`.

siblings.description: Other fields at the same level. Each object has `id` and `display_name`.

works_count.description: The number of works tagged with topics in this field.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works in this field.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works tagged with this field.

created_date.description: When this field was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this field was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

Subfield.description: Third-level category in the topic hierarchy (254 total)

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this subfield.

display_name.description: The English-language label of the subfield.

field.description: The field containing this subfield (parent level).

domain.description: The domain containing this subfield (top level of hierarchy).

topics.description: The topics within this subfield. Each object has `id` and `display_name`.

siblings.description: Other subfields at the same level (across all fields). Each object has `id` and `display_name`.

works_count.description: The number of works tagged with topics in this subfield.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works in this subfield.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works tagged with this subfield.

created_date.description: When this subfield was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this subfield was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this SDG.

description.description: The official UN description of this goal.

works_count.description: The number of works tagged with this SDG.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works tagged with this SDG.

image_url.description: URL to the official SDG icon image.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works tagged with this SDG.

created_date.description: When this SDG was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this SDG was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this country.

display_name.description: The full name of the country.

description.description: A brief description of the country.

is_global_south.description: Whether this country is part of the Global South.

works_count.description: The number of works with authors affiliated with institutions in this country.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works from this country.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works from authors in this country.

authors_api_url.description: A URL that returns all authors with affiliations in this country.

institutions_api_url.description: A URL that returns all institutions in this country.

created_date.description: When this country was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this country was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this continent (uses Wikidata Q-IDs).

description.description: A brief description of the continent.

countries.description: The countries within this continent. Each object has `id` and `display_name`.

created_date.description: When this continent was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this continent was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this language (uses ISO 639-1 codes).

works_count.description: The number of works written in this language.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works in this language.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works in this language.

created_date.description: When this language was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this language was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this award.

display_name.description: The name of the award, if available.

description.description: A description of the award, if available.

funder_award_id.description: The funder's internal ID for this award.

funded_outputs.description: OpenAlex IDs of works funded by this award (first 100).

funded_outputs_count.description: Total number of works funded by this award.

currency.description: The currency of the funding amount, if available.

funding_type.description: The type of funding, if available.

funder_scheme.description: The funder's scheme or program, if available.

start_date.description: Start date of the award (ISO 8601), if available.

end_date.description: End date of the award (ISO 8601), if available.

start_year.description: Start year of the award, if available.

end_year.description: End year of the award, if available.

landing_page_url.description: URL to the award's landing page, if available.

doi.description: DOI for this award, if available.

provenance.description: The source of this award data.

lead_investigator.description: The lead investigator for this award, if available.

investigators.description: List of investigators on this award, if available.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works funded by this award.

created_date.description: When this award was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this award was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

id.description: The OpenAlex ID for this concept.

level.description: The hierarchical level (0 = top level, higher = more specific).

wikidata.description: The Wikidata ID for this concept.

image_url.description: URL for an image representing this concept.

works_count.description: The number of works tagged with this concept.

cited_by_count.description: Total citations to works tagged with this concept.

counts_by_year.description: `works_count` and `cited_by_count` for each of the last ten years.

works_api_url.description: A URL that returns all works tagged with this concept.

created_date.description: When this concept was added to OpenAlex (ISO 8601 date).

updated_date.description: When this concept was last updated (ISO 8601 datetime).

DehydratedAuthor.description: [Dehydrated Author](/api-reference/authors#the-dehydratedauthor-object)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts

DehydratedInstitution.description: [Dehydrated Institution](/api-reference/institutions#the-dehydratedinstitution-object)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts

DehydratedSource.description: [Dehydrated Source](/api-reference/sources#the-dehydratedsource-object)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts

DehydratedFunder.description: [Dehydrated Funder](/api-reference/funders)  reduced-field version used in nested contexts

daily_budget_usd.description: Your daily usage allowance in USD

endpoint_costs_usd.description: Cost per request in USD for each endpoint type
